subject: Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Attn: Beneficiary,
We got a report this afternoon from Zenith Bank, MR RUBEN FRANCISCO
GARCIA from HONDURAS forward his below Account information to Zenith
Bank that you instructed to transfer your  Fund USD$10.5 Million into
MR RUBEN FRANCISCO GARCIA account.
Below is the account information MR RUBEN FRANCISCO GARCIA forwarded
to Zenith Bank this afternoon.
BANK NAME: WELLS FARGO BANK, N.A.
BANK ADDRESS: P.O.BOX 6995
                      PORTLAND, OR 97228-6995
                      USA.
ACCOUNT NUMBER: 1010107810690.
ACCOUNT NAME: MR RUBEN FRANCISCO GARCIA.
SWIFT: WFBIUS6S.
ROUTING: 121000248.
HOME ADDRESS:
COLONIA ORQUIDEA BLANCA, 18 AVE., 9 CALLE, N.O., # 903.
SAN PEDRO SULA, HONDURAS
Please reply immediately the Zenith Bank and the Federal Government
urgently want to know if you are the one instructed  MR RUBEN
FRANCISCO GARCIA to claim your Fund USD$10.5 Million .
Looking  forward for your urgent reply.
I attached the Scan Copy of my ID card for your reference.
Ambassador Mary Beth Leonard
The U.S. Ambassador to the Federal Republic of Nigeria
Direct Tel: +234 805334 7063

subject: Re:   Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Ambassador Mary Beth Leonard,

I am writing to inform you that I did not instruct Mr. Ruben Francisco Garcia from Honduras to claim my fund of USD Million. I have no knowledge of this individual or the account details provided.

Please ensure that my funds are secure and do not proceed with any transactions involving Mr. Ruben Francisco Garcia.

Thank you for bringing this matter to my attention.

Best wishes,
Michael

subject: Re: YOUR PAYMENT VALUED $10,500,000.00 Re: Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Ambassador Mary Beth Leonard,

I am writing to clarify that I have not instructed anyone, especially not Mr. Ruben Francisco Garcia from Honduras, to claim any funds on my behalf. 

I am unsure as to how this misunderstanding has occurred, but I can assure you that I have no connection with Mr. Garcia and have not authorized him to act on my behalf in any capacity.

Please ensure that no funds are transferred into the account provided by Mr. Garcia under my name.

Thank you for bringing this matter to my attention and please do not hesitate to contact me if further clarification is needed.

Best wishes,
Michael
